name: cbvexv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wn(wex(s0, w0)), wn(wex(s1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wn(wex(s0, w0)), wn(wex(s1, w1)))

stmt.origin: 3bitr3i(wn(wex(s0, w0)), wn(wex(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s1, wn(w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wn(wex(s0, w0)), wn(wex(s1, w1)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s1, wn(w1)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wn(wex(s0, w0)))
-| wb(wal(s1, wn(w1)), wn(wex(s1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s1, wn(w1)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wn(wex(s0, w0)))
-| wb(wal(s1, wn(w1)), wn(wex(s1, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s1, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wn(wex(s0, w0)))
-| wb(wal(s1, wn(w1)), wn(wex(s1, w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wn(wex(s0, w0)))
-| wb(wal(s1, wn(w1)), wn(wex(s1, w1)))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wb(wal(s1, wn(w1)), wn(wex(s1, w1)))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. See ~ cbvexvw for a version requiring fewer axioms, to be preferred when sufficient. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-10 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 17-Jul-2021.)
